name: FeArea
description: FEAREA - dynamic battle on the military vehicles of the future. Smash! Capture! Destroy! The action of the 3rd person, where you have to become a pilot of ultra-modern combat vehicles. Take part in a large-scale space war of the distant future!
minimum_requirements: OS: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 / AMD FX-6300 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 560 1GB / AMD Radeon HD 7850 1GB DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 5 GB available space Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
